get.description:
This resource specifies properties needed to establish a device owner.
Retrieves the DOXM resource data.

rowneruuid.description: Format pattern according to IETF RFC 4122.

oxms.description: List of supported owner transfer methods

items.description: The device owner transfer methods that may be selected at device on-boarding. Each value indicates a specific Owner Transfer method0 - Numeric OTM identifier for the Just-Works method (oic.sec.doxm.jw)1 - Numeric OTM identifier for the random PIN method (oic.sec.doxm.rdp)2 - Numeric OTM identifier for the manufacturer certificate method (oic.sec.doxm.mfgcert)3 - Numeric OTM identifier for the decap method (oic.sec.doxm.dcap) (deprecated)

devowneruuid.description: Format pattern according to IETF RFC 4122.

allOf.description: The uuid formatted identity of the device
Format pattern according to IETF RFC 4122.
The selected owner transfer method used during on-boarding

The device owner transfer methods that may be selected at device on-boarding. Each value indicates a specific Owner Transfer method0 - Numeric OTM identifier for the Just-Works method (oic.sec.doxm.jw)1 - Numeric OTM identifier for the random PIN method (oic.sec.doxm.rdp)2 - Numeric OTM identifier for the manufacturer certificate method (oic.sec.doxm.mfgcert)3 - Numeric OTM identifier for the decap method (oic.sec.doxm.dcap) (deprecated)
Bitmask encoding of supported credential types

Credential Types - Cred type encoded as a bitmask.0 - Empty credential used for testing1 - Symmetric pair-wise key2 - Symmetric group key4 - Asymmetric signing key8 - Asymmetric signing key with certificate16 - PIN or password32 - Asymmetric encryption key

id.description: Instance ID of this specific resource

if.description: The interface set supported by this resource
